revised_title: Optical Rotatory Power of Quartz and Infra-Red Absorption Bands
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the optical rotatory power of quartz and found that an infra-red absorption band is optically inactive. They also provided indirect evidence that the activity of other infra-red absorption bands, if present, is too small to be demonstrated experimentally. This research contributes to the understanding of the behavior of light in quartz and the potential for future study in this area.
